analysis.description:
DonationContract.claimFunds (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#358-381) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastClaimed == 0

Reentrancy in DonationContract.batchReturnTokensIfDisabled (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#414-435):
	External calls:
	- ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(currentParticipantAddress,contribution) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#433-434)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nextContributorToReturn (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#435)

Reentrancy in DonationContract.batchReturnTokensIfFailed (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#398-414):
	External calls:
	- ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(currentParticipantAddress,contribution) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#412-413)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nextContributorToReturn (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#413)

Reentrancy in DonationContract.manuallyProcessTransaction (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#330-351):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this)) >= _value + tokensDonated) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#332-337)
	- ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(_from,_value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#340-344)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- donationPhase (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#344-345)
	- tokensDonated (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#344-345)

RootDonationsContract.addNewDonation (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#176-181) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-donationsList.addItem(_donationAddress) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#180-181)

RootDonationsContract.removeDonation (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#181-187) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-donationsList.removeItem(_donationAddress) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#185-187)

DonationContract.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#278-305) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transferFrom(_from,address(this),tokensToTake) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#302-304)

DonationContract.manuallyProcessTransaction (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#330-351) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(_from,_value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#340-344)
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(_from,_value - tokensToTake) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#346-349)
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(_from,_value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#349-351)

DonationContract.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#351-358) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#356-358)

DonationContract.claimFunds (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#358-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(athlete,claimAmount - fee) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#375-379)
	-ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).transfer(feeWallet,fee) (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#379-380)

DonationContract.batchReturnTokensIfFailed (/unique_chucks/29/0x56c9e0b23f54fdba5ef02466eb93211ac9f2c74e.sol#398-414) does not use the value returned by external calls:
